newsitem.title: ITALY: Sex is secret of long life, says Italian, aged 101.
newsitem.headline: Sex is secret of long life, says Italian, aged 101.

text.p: An Italian man of 101, who has been married for 77 years, on Tuesday revealed the secret of his long life -- lots of sex.
"I still feel as if I were a little boy," Giulio Paggi told family and friends gathered to celebrate at the family's home in northeastern Italy.
"And the secret of this youthfulness is that all my life I've put a lot into lovemaking," Paggi said with a smile.

Both Paggi and his wife, Alice Gandus, were born in Alexandria, Egypt in 1896. Paggi was a prisoner of war in World War One. He married Alice in 1920 and worked as a typewriter salesman until he was 90.
